name: The Spook Mansion DUFMO Edition
description:
The Spook Masion is a game where you need to protect your Elevator from the enimies, but, this is The Spook Mansion DUFMO Edition! In that edition don't have the elevator levels, just the Arcade level, in a room after an boss fight, you can play DUFMO and relax from the principal game, but here, we just have DUFMO, no elevators.

I, Dave, hope you enjoy that game, its possible to have some bugs, sorry for that, i'll try to delete all of the bugs to that stage be perfect! :)
